com.example.cmput301f20t18

Class ImagePageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.viewpager.widget.PagerAdapter
      • com.example.cmput301f20t18.ImagePageAdapter

  • public class ImagePageAdapter
extends androidx.viewpager.widget.PagerAdapter
    This is the adapter that manages to enlarge photos from books and navigate through the different photos
    Author:
    Johnathon Referenced https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q2FPDI99-as&t=232s
    See Also:
    Book
